comment._content: Hi, this photo has been mentioned in a discussion thread in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool! -- Seen in a discussion of Flickr Commons. (?)

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: And .... This image has been used in Rob Ketcherside's indicommons.org 'Across the Commons' post Clean Up Yer Mess.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in a feature article on the 1906 wool clip which was published in the Sydney Mail on 17/10/1906 (this issue isn't on Google News Archive...it's on microfilm though)...the SM had evidently visited Bringagee, Groongal and Toganmain stations in the Riverina...it appears likely that this and the accompanying pics were taken at one/all of these locations. The Sydney Mail caption was 'Scoured Piece and Stained Wool' Also see: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2515554854/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2533272578/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363516180/
